nodes.bodyText:
I have mixed feelings of the network validations. Few thoughts:

the validation method (onetstat, oping) is not compatible with Linux,
in some extreme strict docker images, people may not have netstat/ping network util tools installed,
the variable is validated here ZOWE_EXPLORER_HOST could be complicated. Currently it's simple and pointed to external domain where we access the system. But actually the system itself may not be necessary to have to resolve the domain correctly. Resolving the domain is only critical to external, the client side, which we cannot validate here,
I have concerns to reference ZOWE_EXPLORER_HOST from component level. I think we should try to eliminate it as much as possible because the variable itself is confusing and has been used for various purpose: external domain, internal domains, referrer, etc.
